/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The colors in the image are predominantly green, blue, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
